name: Loop (Str0nkyK0ng)
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47

What is Ludum Dare?
Ludum Dare is an online event where games are made from scratch in a weekend.

Theme: Stuck in a loop

Submission Page

The Game

Welcome to Loop. Loop is a comedic narrative game revolving around completing laps around a test loop, similar to the likes of "The Stanley Parable" or "Portal".

What will happen to you in the loop?

Controls:

WASD + Mouse - Move

E - Interaction

Space - Jump

Escape - Pause

See more of my games here
